Bash(uv run kurt content get-metadata e0dd1db8-e5e8-477a-b50c-ccfd4e9959e7)
Bash(uv run kurct content map https://juhache.substack.com)
Bash(uv run kurct content fetch --url https://juhache.substack.com --max-docs 100)

Bash(psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_documents,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN source_url LIKE ''https://juhache.substack.com/p/%'' THEN 1 END) as blog_posts,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN source_url IN (''https://juhache.substack.com/about'', ''https://juhache.substack.com/archive'') THEN 1 END) as special_pages,
    MIN(created_at) as first_ingested,
    MAX(created_at) as last_ingested
FROM documents 
WHERE source_url LIKE ''https://juhache.substack.com%'';")
Bash(sqlite3 .kurt/kurt.sqlite "SELECT id, title, content_path FROM documents WHERE source_url LIKE ''https://juhache.substack.com/p/%'' LIMIT 3")

Bash(psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_posts,
    AVG(array_length(string_to_array(v.content, '' ''), 1)) as avg_word_count,
    MIN(array_length(string_to_array(v.content, '' ''), 1)) as min_word_count,
    MAX(array_length(string_to_array(v.content, '' ''), 1)) as max_word_count,
    PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY array_length(string_to_array(v.content, '' ''), 1)) as median_word_count
FROM documents d
JOIN document_versions v ON d.id = v.document_id
WHERE d.source_url LIKE ''https://juhache.substack.com/p/%''
AND v.content IS NOT NULL
AND v.content != '''';")
Bash(uv run kurct content map https://yoast.com/content-clusters/)

Bash(psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
SELECT 
    d.id,
    d.name,
    d.source_url,
    dc.document_type,
    dc.voice,
    dc.tone,
    dc.primary_topics,
    dc.content_types,
    dc.tools_mentioned,
    dc.created_at as classified_at
FROM documents d
LEFT JOIN document_classifications dc ON d.id = dc.document_id
WHERE d.source_url LIKE ''https://juhache.substack.com/p/%''
ORDER BY d.created_at DESC
LIMIT 10;")

Bash(psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
SELECT 
    d.id,
    d.name,
    d.source_url,
    dc.document_type,
    dc.voice,
    dc.tones,
    dc.structural_elements,
    dc.writing_techniques,
    dc.theme_analysis::text,
    dc.classification_confidence,
    dc.created_at as classified_at
FROM documents d
LEFT JOIN document_classifications dc ON d.id = dc.document_id
WHERE d.source_url LIKE ''https://juhache.substack.com/p/%''
ORDER BY d.created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;")

Bash(gh pr create --title "Update all Kurt CLI commands to new structure" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
Updated all Kurt CLI commands in documentation to match the new CLI structure where commands are organized under the `kurt content` namespace.

## Changes
- `kurt document list` â†’ `kurt content list`
- `kurt document get` â†’ `kurt content get-metadata`
- `kurt document query` â†’ `kurt content list`
- `kurt ingest fetch` â†’ `kurt content fetch`
- `kurt ingest map` â†’ `kurt content fetch --discover`
- `kurt index` â†’ `kurt content index`
- `kurt cluster compute` â†’ `kurt content cluster`

## Files Updated
- CLAUDE.md
- KURT.md
- .claude/commands/create-project.md
- .claude/commands/resume-project.md
- .claude/commands/_shared/check-organizational-foundation.md
- All skill files in .claude/skills/

## Testing
- Verified all commands match `kurt --help` output
- Spot-checked multiple files for consistency
- Fixed typos introduced during bulk replacement

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)" --base main)
